conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway transformation confirmed with consistent wall heights and interior exposure.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Wall thickness and floor planes are clearly defined with no perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity layout. Room adjacencies and wall proportions match the 2D plan perfectly. Minimal omission of the exact window count in some areas.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate (kitchen, living, bedroom, bathroom). Scale is logical relative to the rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Geometry is readable and lighting is consistent. No UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings are simplified compared to the specific mullion details in the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D volumetric translation of the provided 2D architectural layout.
